# âš ï¸ Generated Files - Do Not Edit

This folder contains **automatically generated** files from `src/app.css`.

## ğŸš« Don't Edit These Files

All files in this folder are generated by `scripts/build-css.js` and will be **overwritten** when you run:
```bash
npm run build:css
```

## âœ… Edit This Instead

**Edit `src/app.css`** - This is the single source of truth for all theming.

After editing `src/app.css`, run `npm run build:css` to regenerate these files.

## ğŸ“¦ What These Files Are For

These files are for **consumers** of the library who want to import just the theme or CSS:

- `zabi-components.css` - Full CSS with Tailwind processed
- `zabi-components-theme.css` - Theme with Tailwind import
- `zabi-components-theme-only.css` - Theme only (no Tailwind)
- `zabi-components-theme-dark.css` - Dark mode theme
- `zabi-components-theme-dark-only.css` - Dark mode theme only
- `zabi-components-colors.css` - Standalone CSS custom properties

See `THEMING.md` in the root directory for more information.
